00047 sigar_cpu_t _prev_cpu, *_prev_cpup = NULL;

00049 // default pause (in ms) to calcuate rates
00050 const int DEFAULT_PAUSE = 500;
00051 
00052 // for unit conversion to/from MB/GB
00053 const double KiB = 1024.;
00054 const double MiB = KiB * 1024;
00055 const double GiB = MiB * 1024;
00056

00058 RecMutex _net_mutex;
00059 sigar_net_interface_stat_t _prev_net_stat, *_prev_net_statp = NULL;
00060 Stopwatch _net_stat_stopwatch;
00061 const int DEFAULT_NET_STAT_FLAGS =
00062     SIGAR_NETCONN_CLIENT|SIGAR_NETCONN_SERVER|SIGAR_NETCONN_TCP;

00086 sigar_t *sigar() {
00087   if (!_sigar)
00088     HT_ASSERT(sigar_open(&_sigar) == SIGAR_OK);
00089 
00090   return _sigar;
00091 }

00093 // we don't expect filesystem changes while the process is running
00094 sigar_file_system_list_t _fs_list, *_fs_listp = NULL;
00095 
00096 sigar_file_system_list_t &fs_list() {
00097   if (!_fs_listp) {
00098     HT_ASSERT(sigar_file_system_list_get(sigar(), &_fs_list) == SIGAR_OK);
00099     _fs_listp = &_fs_list;
00100   }
00101   return _fs_list;
00102 }
00103 
00104 bool compute_disk_usage(const char *prefix, sigar_disk_usage_t &u) {
00105   sigar_disk_usage_t t;
00106   sigar_file_system_t *fs = fs_list().data, *fs_end = fs + fs_list().number;
00107   size_t prefix_len = strlen(prefix);
00108   u.reads = u.writes = u.write_bytes = u.read_bytes = 0;
00109   size_t num_found = 0;
00110 
00111   for (; fs < fs_end; ++fs) {
00112     if (strncmp(prefix, fs->dir_name, prefix_len) == 0
00113         && sigar_disk_usage_get(sigar(), fs->dir_name, &t) == SIGAR_OK) {
00114       u.reads += t.reads;
00115       u.writes += t.writes;
00116       u.read_bytes += t.read_bytes;
00117       u.write_bytes += t.write_bytes;
00118       ++num_found;
00119     }
00120   }
00121   if (num_found > 0)
00122     return true;
00123 
00124   return false;
00125 }
00126 
00127 bool compute_fs_usage(const char *prefix, sigar_file_system_usage_t &u) {
00128   sigar_file_system_usage_t t;
00129   sigar_file_system_t *fs = fs_list().data, *fs_end = fs + fs_list().number;
00130   size_t prefix_len = strlen(prefix);
00131   u.use_percent = 0.;
00132   u.total = u.free = u.used = u.avail = u.files = u.free_files = 0;
00133   size_t num_found = 0;
00134 
00135   for (; fs < fs_end; ++fs) {
00136     if (strncmp(prefix, fs->dir_name, prefix_len) == 0
00137         && sigar_file_system_usage_get(sigar(), fs->dir_name, &t) == SIGAR_OK) {
00138 
00139       u.use_percent += t.use_percent * t.total; // for weighted mean;
00140       u.total += t.total;
00141       u.free += t.free;
00142       u.used += t.used;
00143       u.avail += t.avail;
00144       u.files += t.files;
00145       u.free_files += t.free_files;
00146       ++num_found;
00147     }
00148   }
00149   if (num_found > 0) {
00150     u.use_percent /= u.total;
00151     return true;
00152   }
00153   return false;
00154 }

00233 CpuInfo &CpuInfo::init() {
00234   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00235   sigar_cpu_info_list_t l;
00236 
00237   HT_ASSERT(sigar_cpu_info_list_get(sigar(), &l) == SIGAR_OK);
00238   sigar_cpu_info_t &s = l.data[0];
00239 
00240   vendor = s.vendor;
00241   model = s.model;
00242   mhz = s.mhz;
00243   cache_size = s.cache_size;
00244   total_sockets = s.total_sockets;
00245   total_cores = s.total_cores;
00246   cores_per_socket = s.cores_per_socket;
00247 
00248   sigar_cpu_info_list_destroy(sigar(), &l);
00249 
00250   return *this;
00251 }
00252 
00253 CpuStat &CpuStat::refresh() {
00254   ScopedRecLock cpu_lock(_cpu_mutex);
00255   bool need_pause = false;
00256   {
00257     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex); // needed for sigar object
00258 
00259     if (!_prev_cpup) {
00260       HT_ASSERT(sigar_cpu_get(sigar(), &_prev_cpu) == SIGAR_OK);
00261       _prev_cpup = &_prev_cpu;
00262       need_pause = true;
00263     }
00264   }
00265   if (need_pause)
00266     poll(0, 0, DEFAULT_PAUSE);
00267   {
00268     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00269     sigar_cpu_t curr;
00270     HT_ASSERT(sigar_cpu_get(sigar(), &curr) == SIGAR_OK);
00271 
00272     sigar_cpu_perc_t p;
00273     HT_ASSERT(sigar_cpu_perc_calculate(&_prev_cpu, &curr, &p) == SIGAR_OK);
00274 
00275     user = p.user * 100.;
00276     sys = p.sys * 100.;
00277     nice = p.nice * 100.;
00278     idle = p.idle * 100.;
00279     wait = p.wait * 100.;
00280     irq = p.irq * 100.;
00281     soft_irq = p.soft_irq * 100.;
00282     stolen = p.stolen * 100.;
00283     total = p.combined * 100.;
00284 
00285     _prev_cpu = curr;
00286   }
00287   return *this;
00288 }
00289 
00290 MemStat &MemStat::refresh() {
00291   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00292   sigar_mem_t m;
00293 
00294   HT_ASSERT(sigar_mem_get(sigar(), &m) == SIGAR_OK);
00295 
00296   ram = m.ram;
00297   total = m.total / MiB;
00298   used = m.used / MiB;
00299   free = m.free / MiB;
00300   actual_used = m.actual_used / MiB;
00301   actual_free = m.actual_free / MiB;
00302 
00303   return *this;
00304 }
00305 
00306 DiskStat &DiskStat::refresh(const char *dir_prefix) {
00307   ScopedRecLock disk_lock(_disk_mutex);
00308   bool need_pause = false;
00309   {
00310     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00311 
00312     if ((prefix != dir_prefix || !_prev_disk_statp)
00313         && compute_disk_usage(dir_prefix, _prev_disk_stat)) {
00314       HT_DEBUGF("prev_disk_stat: reads=%llu, reads=%llu, read_bytes=%llu "
00315                 "write_bytes=%llu", (Llu)_prev_disk_stat.reads,
00316                 (Llu)_prev_disk_stat.writes, (Llu)_prev_disk_stat.read_bytes,
00317                 (Llu)_prev_disk_stat.write_bytes);
00318       _prev_disk_statp = &_prev_disk_stat;
00319       prefix = dir_prefix;
00320       need_pause = true;
00321     }
00322     prefix = dir_prefix;
00323   }
00324   if (need_pause)
00325     poll(0, 0, DEFAULT_PAUSE);
00326   {
00327     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00328 
00329     if (_prev_disk_statp) {
00330       sigar_disk_usage_t s;
00331 
00332       if (compute_disk_usage(dir_prefix, s)) {
00333         HT_DEBUGF("curr_disk_stat: reads=%llu, reads=%llu, read_bytes=%llu "
00334                   "write_bytes=%llu", (Llu)s.reads, (Llu)s.writes,
00335                   (Llu)s.read_bytes, (Llu)s.write_bytes);
00336         _disk_stat_stopwatch.stop();
00337         double elapsed = _disk_stat_stopwatch.elapsed();
00338 
00339         reads_rate = (s.reads - _prev_disk_stat.reads) / elapsed;
00340         writes_rate = (s.writes - _prev_disk_stat.writes) / elapsed;
00341         read_rate =
00342             (s.read_bytes - _prev_disk_stat.read_bytes) / elapsed / MiB;
00343         write_rate =
00344             (s.write_bytes - _prev_disk_stat.write_bytes) / elapsed / MiB;
00345 
00346         _prev_disk_stat = s;
00347         _disk_stat_stopwatch.start();
00348       }
00349     }
00350   }
00351   return *this;
00352 }

00354 SwapStat &SwapStat::refresh() {
00355   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00356   sigar_swap_t s;
00357 
00358   HT_ASSERT(sigar_swap_get(sigar(), &s) == SIGAR_OK);
00359 
00360   total = s.total / MiB;
00361   used = s.used / MiB;
00362   free = s.free / MiB;
00363   page_in = s.page_in;
00364   page_out = s.page_out;
00365 
00366   return *this;
00367 }

00369 OsInfo &OsInfo::init() {
00370   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00371   sigar_sys_info_t s;
00372 
00373   HT_ASSERT(sigar_sys_info_get(sigar(), &s) == SIGAR_OK);
00374 
00375   name = s.name;
00376   version = s.version;
00377 
00378   char *ptr = (char *)version.c_str();
00379   version_major = (uint16_t)strtol(ptr, &ptr, 10);
00380   ptr++;
00381   version_minor = (uint16_t)strtol(ptr, &ptr, 10);
00382   ptr++;
00383   version_micro = (uint16_t)strtol(ptr, &ptr, 10);
00384 
00385   arch = s.arch;
00386   machine = s.machine;
00387   description = s.description;
00388   patch_level = s.patch_level;
00389   vendor = s.vendor;
00390   vendor_version = s.vendor_version;
00391   vendor_name = s.vendor_name;
00392 
00393   return *this;
00394 }
00395 
00396 NetInfo &NetInfo::init() {
00397   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00398   sigar_net_interface_config_t ifc;
00399   sigar_net_info_t ni;
00400   char addrbuf[SIGAR_INET6_ADDRSTRLEN];
00401 
00402   HT_ASSERT(sigar_net_info_get(sigar(), &ni) == SIGAR_OK);
00403   host_name = ni.host_name;
00404   default_gw = ni.default_gateway;
00405 
00406   if (sigar_net_interface_config_primary_get(sigar(), &ifc) == SIGAR_OK) {
00407     primary_if = ifc.name;
00408     HT_ASSERT(sigar_net_address_to_string(sigar(), &ifc.address, addrbuf)
00409               == SIGAR_OK);
00410     primary_addr = addrbuf;
00411   }
00412   if (primary_addr.empty())
00413     primary_addr = "127.0.0.1";
00414 
00415   return *this;
00416 }
00417 
00418 NetStat &NetStat::refresh() {
00419   ScopedRecLock net_lock(_net_mutex);
00420   {
00421     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00422     sigar_net_stat_t s;
00423 
00424     if (sigar_net_stat_get(sigar(), &s, DEFAULT_NET_STAT_FLAGS) == SIGAR_OK) {
00425       tcp_established = s.tcp_states[SIGAR_TCP_ESTABLISHED];
00426       tcp_listen = s.tcp_states[SIGAR_TCP_LISTEN];
00427       tcp_time_wait = s.tcp_states[SIGAR_TCP_TIME_WAIT];
00428       tcp_close_wait = s.tcp_states[SIGAR_TCP_CLOSE_WAIT];
00429       tcp_idle = s.tcp_states[SIGAR_TCP_IDLE];
00430     }
00431     else {
00432       tcp_established = tcp_listen = tcp_time_wait = tcp_close_wait =
00433           tcp_idle = 0;
00434     }
00435   }
00436   bool need_pause = false;
00437   const char *ifname = System::net_info().primary_if.c_str();
00438   {
00439     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00440 
00441     if (!_prev_net_statp) {
00442       if (sigar_net_interface_stat_get(sigar(), ifname, &_prev_net_stat)
00443           == SIGAR_OK) {
00444         _prev_net_statp = &_prev_net_stat;
00445         _net_stat_stopwatch.start();
00446         HT_DEBUGF("prev_net_stat: rx_bytes=%llu, tx_bytes=%llu",
00447                   (Llu)_prev_net_stat.rx_bytes, (Llu)_prev_net_stat.tx_bytes);
00448         need_pause = true;
00449       }
00450       else {
00451         rx_rate = tx_rate = 0;
00452       }
00453     }
00454   }
00455   if (need_pause)
00456     poll(0, 0, DEFAULT_PAUSE);
00457   {
00458     ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00459 
00460     if (_prev_net_statp) {
00461       sigar_net_interface_stat_t curr;
00462 
00463       if (sigar_net_interface_stat_get(sigar(), ifname, &curr) == SIGAR_OK) {
00464         _net_stat_stopwatch.stop();
00465         double elapsed = _net_stat_stopwatch.elapsed();
00466         HT_DEBUGF("curr_net_stat: rx_bytes=%llu, tx_bytes=%llu",
00467                   (Llu)curr.rx_bytes, (Llu)curr.tx_bytes);
00468 
00469         rx_rate = (curr.rx_bytes - _prev_net_stat.rx_bytes) / elapsed / KiB;
00470         tx_rate = (curr.tx_bytes - _prev_net_stat.tx_bytes) / elapsed / KiB;
00471 
00472         _prev_net_stat = curr;
00473         _net_stat_stopwatch.start();
00474       }
00475     }
00476   }
00477   return *this;
00478 }

00480 ProcInfo &ProcInfo::init() {
00481   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00482   sigar_proc_exe_t exeinfo;
00483   sigar_proc_args_t arginfo;
00484   sigar_proc_cred_name_t name;
00485 
00486   pid = sigar_pid_get(sigar());
00487   HT_ASSERT(sigar_proc_exe_get(sigar(), pid, &exeinfo) == SIGAR_OK);
00488   HT_ASSERT(sigar_proc_args_get(sigar(), pid, &arginfo) == SIGAR_OK);
00489   HT_ASSERT(sigar_proc_cred_name_get(sigar(), pid, &name) == SIGAR_OK);
00490 
00491   user = name.user;
00492   exe = exeinfo.name;
00493   cwd = exeinfo.cwd;
00494   root = exeinfo.root;
00495 
00496   for (size_t i = 0; i < arginfo.number; ++i)
00497     args.push_back(arginfo.data[i]);
00498 
00499   sigar_proc_args_destroy(sigar(), &arginfo);
00500 
00501   return *this;
00502 }
00503 
00504 ProcStat &ProcStat::refresh() {
00505   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00506   sigar_proc_cpu_t c;
00507   sigar_proc_mem_t m;
00508 
00509   sigar_pid_t pid = sigar_pid_get(sigar());
00510   HT_ASSERT(sigar_proc_cpu_get(sigar(), pid, &c) == SIGAR_OK);
00511   HT_ASSERT(sigar_proc_mem_get(sigar(), pid, &m) == SIGAR_OK);
00512 
00513   cpu_user = c.user;
00514   cpu_sys = c.sys;
00515   cpu_total = c.total;
00516   cpu_pct = c.percent * 100.;
00517   vm_size = m.size / MiB;
00518   vm_resident = m.resident / MiB;
00519   vm_share = HT_FIELD_NOTIMPL(m.share) ? 0 : m.share / MiB;
00520   minor_faults = HT_FIELD_NOTIMPL(m.minor_faults) ? 0 : m.minor_faults;
00521   major_faults = HT_FIELD_NOTIMPL(m.major_faults) ? 0 : m.major_faults;
00522   page_faults = HT_FIELD_NOTIMPL(m.page_faults) ? 0 : m.page_faults;;
00523 
00524   return *this;
00525 }
00526 
00527 FsStat &FsStat::refresh(const char *dir_prefix) {
00528   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00529   sigar_file_system_usage_t u;
00530   prefix = dir_prefix;
00531 
00532   if (compute_fs_usage(dir_prefix, u)) {
00533     use_pct = u.use_percent * 100.;
00534     total = u.total / MiB; // u.total already in KB
00535     free = u.free / MiB;
00536     used = u.used / MiB;
00537     avail = u.avail / MiB;
00538     files = u.files;
00539     free_files = u.free_files;
00540   }
00541   return *this;
00542 }
00543 
00544 TermInfo &TermInfo::init() {
00545   ScopedRecLock lock(_mutex);
00546   int err;
00547 
00548   if (setupterm(0,  1, &err) != ERR) {
00549     term = getenv("TERM");
00550     num_lines = lines;
00551     num_cols = columns;
00552   }
00553   else {
00554     term = "dumb";
00555     num_lines = 24;
00556     num_cols = 80;
00557   }
00558   return *this;
00559 }

00561 const char *system_info_lib_version() {
00562   sigar_version_t *v = sigar_version_get();
00563   return v->description;
00564 }
00565 
00566 std::ostream &system_info_lib_version(std::ostream &out) {
00567   sigar_version_t *v = sigar_version_get();
00568   out <<"{SigarVersion: build_date='"<< v->build_date <<"' scm_revision='"
00569       << v->scm_revision <<"'\n version='"<< v->version <<"' archname='"
00570       << v->archname <<"'\n archlib='"<< v->archlib <<"' binname='"
00571       << v->binname <<"'\n description='"<< v->description <<"'\n major="
00572       << v->major <<" minor="<< v->minor <<" maint="<< v->maint <<" build="
00573       << v->build <<'}';
00574   return out;
00575 }

00616 std::ostream &operator<<(std::ostream &out, const SwapStat &s) {
00617   out <<"{SwapStat: total="<< s.total <<" used="<< s.used <<" free="<< s.free
00618       <<" page_in="<< s.page_in <<" page_out="<< s.page_out <<'}';
00619   return out;
